pages.title: Quantum Diamond
pages.text: These things are so difficult to handle as they attempt to phase in and out of my very handle. I desperately need not only a way to separate but if I really want to utilize these quantum like properties, I need to contain it.
I have created blueprints for a recipe that will allow me to extract the quantum properties all the while containing it in a plating.

And thus following this extraction process I should be able to harvest a diamond (which is nice in of itself) but also the quantum properties contained in a single plating! Although it is going to cost me an entire block of Redstone just to power the machinery, which although very resource hungry, should be worth it in the future.

pages.title: Extract Quantum
pages.text: I should follow the instructions for myself so that I may continue my research.
